thread.section_title: Hotel Artemide - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautiful and comfortable
thread.title_full: Beautiful and comfortable - Review of Hotel Artemide, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Vania S
title: Beautiful and comfortable
text: I have stayed at this beautiful hotel centrally situated at a walking distance to main attractions and transportation. It has all facilities of a big hotel and offers continental breakfast, or if you prefer the genuine capuccino with pastries in a very Italian style. Rooms and bathroom are big enough to forget you are in Europe at bed time! The quality of work they offer there makes one always return!
